snippet.title: The Unliving - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Take control of death itself and unleash your monstrous armies upon the realm of the living! The Unliving puts you in the tattered robes of a necromancer as they learn new dark magic to raise armies of the undead to do their bidding, conquering procedurally-generated kingdoms. The Unliving is coming to early access on Steam in October of 2022.

#IGN #IGNExpo2022
